definition.text: There are a few things you should consider every time you switch branches! Let's go through a quick list before you proceed!

paragraphs.text: It may happen that the workspaces or other data structures in the master branch are not compatible with those in the other branch.
If the current workspace is incompatible with the software in the other branch, the workspace may break upon reloading the app. In such a case, load one of the Plugin Workspaces of the new branch.
Even the structure of mined data may have changed!
Always check the README file in the branch of the repository you wish to access for any comments on backward compatibility. Before switching branches, back up your work!
